name: Wildlife insights
description: Train an AutoML model to classify animals from camera trap pictures.

parameters.name: cloud-storage-bucket
parameters.label: Cloud Storage bucket
parameters.helpText: Cloud Storage bucket name for the AutoML dataset image files.

parameters.name: bigquery-dataset
parameters.label: BigQuery dataset
parameters.helpText: BigQuery dataset ID for the images database.

parameters.name: bigquery-table
parameters.label: BigQuery table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery dataset ID for the images database.

parameters.name: min-images-per-class
parameters.label: Minimum images per class
parameters.helpText: Minimum number of images required per class for training.

parameters.name: max-images-per-class
parameters.label: Maximum images per class
parameters.helpText: Maximum number of images allowed per class for training.
